title: Performance: kernel soft lockup issue
content:
If the server is the Kubernetes control plane node or an NFS server, the entire system will stop respondingÂ for a while. The system displays the following error message:

kernel:NMI watchdog: BUG: soft lockup - CPU#3 stuck for 22s

Cause

The cause for this issue is unknown.

Solution

Try the following solutions to resolve this issue:

  1. Reduce the load or add more computing resource.
  2. Optimize the disk usage. For example, change the NFS server from "sync" mode to "async" mode.
